bountySets.descriptionHeroic: For our biggest thrill seekers out there, the Barrens (Heroic) offers only the best hunting trips.
bountySets.descriptionNormal: From rocky deserts to rugged hills, many wild and dangerous creatures roam the Barrens.
bountySets.name: The Barrens

bountySets.descriptionHeroic: Please remember to bring protective footwear when traversing Felwood (Heroic).
bountySets.descriptionNormal: Once a serene forest, Felwood has become the heart of the Legion's corruption in Kalimdor.
bountySets.name: Felwood

bountySets.descriptionHeroic: No matter the season, you can always count on perfect skiing conditions in Winterspring (Heroic).
bountySets.descriptionNormal: This valley is an uninviting land of constant winter and unique wildlife.
bountySets.name: Winterspring

bountySets.descriptionHeroic: Dwarves! Elementals! AND DRAGONS?! Blackrock Mountain (Heroic) has it all.
bountySets.descriptionNormal: Secrets and treasures lie underneath the mountain, guarded by ancient beings.
bountySets.name: Blackrock Mountain

bountySets.descriptionHeroic: Pull out your pauldrons and blankets and determine which side takes it all in Alterac Valley (Heroic).
bountySets.descriptionNormal: A heated struggle in a frozen valley. The Alliance and Horde collide in a battle for the ages.
bountySets.name: Alterac Valley

bountySets.descriptionHeroic: Please don't step on the eggs as you burst your way into Onyxia's Lair (Heroic).
bountySets.descriptionNormal: Onyxia's stolen the shards of naaru. Traverse the caverns to reclaim them, and hope to escape her wrath.
bountySets.name: Onyxia's Lair

bountySets.descriptionHeroic: Something fishy's going on. You'll need a noseplug as you investigate Darkshore (Heroic).
bountySets.descriptionNormal: Murlocs and Naga are just the beginning of what's been troubling Kalimdor's shores.
bountySets.name: Darkshore

bountySets.descriptionHeroic: Millenia fly by with an Old God by your side. Get ready for a tour of The Sunken City (Heroic).
bountySets.descriptionNormal: Zin-Azshari decended beneath the ocean 10,000 years ago. What mysteries will you uncover?
bountySets.name: The Sunken City
